ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

greed.question: Did I make wealth and material possessions my highest priority in life?
greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

extracted_data_phrases: in your community , workplace , or daily interactions
oppression.question: Have you mistreated, harassed, or discriminated against others in your community, workplace, or daily interactions?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

oppression.question: Have you mistreated others?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

autonomy.question: Have you taken for granted the good things in your life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control and use impolite language in conversations, disrespecting others through your words?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in a manner that was unbecoming of a Christian
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control and speak to others in a manner that was unbecoming of a Christian, using words that were hurtful or unjust?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
especially during social gatherings or when engaging in activities that involve sampling food and drinks
in activities that involve sampling food and drinks
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially during social gatherings or when engaging in activities that involve sampling food and drinks?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking at home
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking at home, especially when spending time with family?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing private matters of acquaintances for my own entertainment
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing private matters of acquaintances for my own entertainment, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private concerns, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.
